svg.onload: function f(t) { return 240/(1+Math.exp(-(20-parseInt(t))*0.15));}; var rect=document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg','rect'); rect.setAttribute('x','0'); rect.setAttribute('y','0'); rect.setAttribute('width','100'); rect.setAttribute('height','10'); rect.setAttribute('fill','hsl('+f(15)+',90%,40%)'); this.appendChild(rect);
